txt.en: 'Spiders are rare within the bounds of these lands, being found only within a small area of southern East Wall. Their venom is potent but not deadly so we send young warriors in to test their skills and see if they can triumph over their fears. Recently, our trials have stopped coming back from The Creeping Wood. The spreading darkness has empowered the vermin within the tunnels and I fear our young warriors may have been trapped within ever-tightening webs.'
What can you tell me about the Creeping Wood?
